https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/98BdRRlfmMUJ4WscNl0NpXcp7qg.jpg Inspired by real-life Elsa Andersson, this mostly fictional movie tells the story of her upbringing as a farmer's daughter, in the early 1900s, who dreams of getting away from the farm and becoming an aviatrix. As White as in Snow
